squidpony.squidgrid.los

Class RayCastingLOS

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.los.RayCastingLOS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LOSSolver

    @Beta
public class RayCastingLOS
extends java.lang.Object
implements LOSSolver
    Uses a series of rays internal to the start and end point to determine visibility. Does not respect translucency.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RayCastingLOS()
      Creates an instance of this solver which uses the default gap and step.

      java.util.Queue<java.awt.Point> getLastPath()
      Returns the path of the last LOS calculation, with the starting point as the head of the queue.
      boolean isReachable(float[][] resistanceMap, int startx, int starty, int targetx, int targety)
      Returns true if a line can be drawn from the start point to the target point without intervening obstructions.

                           float force,

                           RadiusStrategy radiusStrategy)
        Description copied from interface: LOSSolver
        Returns true if a line can be drawn from the start point to the target point without intervening obstructions.
        Specified by:
        isReachable in interface LOSSolver
        Parameters:
        resistanceMap - marks the level of resistance the the line per cell
        force - the amount of impetus to start with
        decay - the amount the force is reduced per unit distance
        radiusStrategy - the strategy to use in computing unit distance
        Returns:

      • isReachable

        public boolean isReachable(float[][] resistanceMap,
                           int startx,
                           int starty,
                           int targetx,
                           int targety)
        Description copied from interface: LOSSolver
        Returns true if a line can be drawn from the start point to the target point without intervening obstructions. Does not take into account resistance less than opaque or distance cost. Uses the implementation's default RadiusStrategy.
        Specified by:
        isReachable in interface LOSSolver
        Returns:
